description: This file defines the JobsProvider class, a Flutter ChangeNotifier that manages loading, searching, applying to jobs, and handling related API calls within a jobs-related app module.

classes.name: JobsProvider
classes.description: Manages loading jobs, searching, getting job details, and applying for jobs. Extends ChangeNotifier for state management in Flutter.

methods.name: fetchJobs
methods.description: Fetches available jobs from the API and updates local state with the list of jobs or error if any occurred.

methods.name: applyToJob
methods.description: Sends a request to apply to a specific job by ID. On success, refreshes the job list; on failure, sets an error message.
